response.original_title: Absolution Review: Neeson Anchors a Flawed Fusion of Drama and Action
response.overview: In Absolution, Liam Neeson plays Thug, an aging Boston gangster steeped in violence and crime. But Thug is diagnosed with a terminal illness and is forced to confront his past. In particular, he must be forgiven by his estranged daughter Daisy, a single mother struggling to provide for her children.
response.title: Absolution Review: Neeson Anchors a Flawed Fusion of Drama and Action
